titleStmt.title: Europe a slave, unless England break her chains discovering the grand designs of the French-Popish party in England for several years past.
Europe esclave si l'Angelterre ne rompt ses fers. English
titleStmt.author: Cerdan, Jean-Paul, comte de.
Evelyn, John, 1655-1699.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: L'Europe esclave si l'Angleterre ne rompt ses fers.
Attributed to Jean Paul Cerdan. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
